title: Samvardhana Motherson Intl to acquire 11% stake in Israel's REE Automotive for $15 mn
description: Samvardhana Motherson International Ltd will acquire an 11 per cent stake in Israel's REE Automotive Ltd for up to USD 15 million. The acquisition involves subscribing to over 3.6 million Class A ordinary shares. Both companies will collaborate on manufacturing and integrating REE's innovative 'REEcorner' technology for commercial electric vehicles.
